text: Buldakov () is a Russian masculine surname, its feminine counterpart is Buldakova. It may refer to *Aleksey Buldakov (1951–2019), Russian film actor *Igor Buldakov (1930–1979), Russian rower *Lyudmila Buldakova (1938–2006), Russian volleyball player, wife of Igor Category:Russian-language surnames
title: Buldakov
